transport.question: I go beep beep! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I have wheels and go on the road.
👪 Mommy, Daddy, and you can ride in me.
🔑 You need a key to start me.

transport.question: I go choo choo! I ride on a track! What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I can be very long!
💨 I sometimes make a lot of steam.
🎟️ You need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I float on the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can be big or small.
🦆 Sometimes ducks float near me.
⚓ I have an anchor.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You use your feet to make me go.
🔔 I sometimes have a bell that you can ring.
⛑️ It's important to wear a helmet when riding me.

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 I stop at special places to pick up children
🚸 I have flashing lights when I stop.
🎒 Many children go to school on me

transport.question: I fly in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings and an engine.
☁️ I can take you to far away places.
💺 People sit inside me.

transport.question: I help farmers in the fields. What am I?

hints.text: 🚜 I am big and strong
🌾 I help with planting and harvesting.
🛑 I move slowly.

transport.question: I have a siren and flashing lights, and I help people who are sick. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I go very fast!
🏥 I take people to the hospital.
🚑 I'm white with red.

transport.question: I go up, up, up into space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I have a very powerful engine.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
✨ I explore the planets and stars.

transport.question: I take you over the water, and I am bigger than a small boat. What am I?

hints.text: ⛴️ I carry many people and cars.
🌊 I travel across the sea.
🔔 You might hear a horn on me.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fishies swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats float on me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I am a home for a fish. I am hard and colorful. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of many tiny creatures.
🐠 Fish like to hide in me.
🌈 I come in many colors like red, yellow, and blue.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I pinch with my claws.
🚶 I scuttle sideways.
🐚 I live by the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have many rows of teeth.
🦈 People are scared of me.
🌊 I live in the ocean.

ocean.question: I make a sound when I crash onto the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm a big movement of water.
🏖️ I sometimes knock down sandcastles.
🗣️ You can hear me from far away.

ocean.question: I am small and hard and sometimes colorful. You can find me on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 Some people collect me.
🏠 Some animals used to live inside me.
🏖️ You can find me where the sand is.

ocean.question: I am a very big animal that lives in the ocean and sings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am bigger than a car.
🎶 I make sounds under the water.
🌊 I swim in the deep blue sea.

ocean.question: I'm like a star, but I live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have arms, but I can't hug.
🖐️ I have five arms in most cases.
🌊 I crawl along the ocean floor.

ocean.question: I am a funny-looking fish with a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I have a head like a horse.
🦘 I carry my babies in a pouch like a kangaroo.
🌿 I am very small and live near seagrass.

ocean.question: I float in the water and sting you if you get too close. What am I?

hints.text: 🪼 I am wobbly and clear.
🤕 I can hurt you, so be careful!
🌊 I drift with the ocean currents.
